name: Shallotwings 97
description:
For MiniLD #64.

What started as a love-letter to Pilotwings 64 got very lost along the way.

Epilepsy warning on level 2(?).

Might require a graphics card from the last 10 years.

Estimated 75% of glitches are deliberate or embraced.

Music tracks by Uncle Milk, under cc-attribution license, via freemusicarchive.org: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Uncle_Milk/
